title: Garnier Hair Food 3-in-1 Hair Treatment Mask, Smooths and Nourishes, For Frizzy & Curly Hair, No Silicones, Vegan Formula, Coconut Oil, Ultimate Blends, 400ml (Packing and Ingredients may vary)

features: Multi-use hair treatment for softer, smoother hair, Anti-frizz solution, Use as a conditioner, a rinse-out hair mask or a leave-in conditioner, Ideal for frizzy & curly hair
Leaves hair feeling smooth and nourished, Get smoother hair for up to 48 hours, Provides intense shine, moisture recharge and strength lift
Wet your hair and apply shampoo, lather, and rinse, Use conditioner on the lengths and ends, Leave for a minute, rinse, Follow with the mask as a leave-in or rinse-out treatment
Boosted with Vitamins C, E, F, 98 % natural origin ingredients, 100% vegan formula, No silicones for a natural feel, No weigh down
Contents: 1x Garnier Ultimate Blends, Hair Food Coco-Macadamia 3-in-1 Hair Treatment Mask, For Frizzy & Curly Hair, Vegan Formula, Volume: 400ml
description: Product Description Dig into Garnier Ultimate Blends Hair Food, and discover our best haircare products to nourish and condition your hair. Get super food for super hair! Our shampoos, conditioners and hair masks are made with ingredients of up to 98% natural origin, have 100% vegan formulas* and they are silicone free for a natural feel. Try our super foaming shampoos and ultra-melting conditioners for softer, shinier, healthier looking hair! Our 3-in-1 multi-use masks can be used as a conditioner, rinse-out hair mask or leave-in conditioner. They are ideal for intensely nourished, healthy-looking hair! We have 7 blends to choose from: Banana, Coconut, Watermelon, Papaya, Aloe, Coco Butter and Pineapple. Find the perfect blend for your hair type! Ingredients 1161330 – INGREDIENTS: AQUA / WATER, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, GLYCERIN, ISOPROPYL MYRISTATE, STEARAMIDOPROPYL DIMETHYLAMINE, MACADAMIA INTEGRIFOLIA SEED OIL, GLYCINE SOJA OIL / SOYBEAN OIL, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS SEED OIL / SUNFLOWER SEED OIL SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS SEED OIL / JOJOBA SEED OIL, PRUNUS AMYGDALUS DULCIS OIL / SWEET ALMOND OIL, COCOS NUCIFERA OIL / COCONUT OIL, SODIUM HYDROXIDE, COCO-CAPRYLATE/CAPRATE, HYDROXYPROPYL GUAR HYDROXYPROPYLTRIMONIUM CHLORIDE, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, CITRIC ACID, TARTARIC ACID, CETYL ESTERS, SALICYLIC ACID, CARAMEL, LINALOOL, ,GERANIOL, COUMARIN, LIMONENE, CITRAL, CITRONELLOL, BENZYL ALCOHOL BENZYL CINNAMATE, BENZYL SALICYLATE, PARFUM / FRAGRANCE, (F.I.L C232321/1) Directions Apply after shampooing, gently massage into hair, leave on for a few minutes, then rinse thoroughly. Safety Warning ⚠️For external use only. Read package for more details. See more
